definition: (slang) rich, good-looking guy
surname Kai
triumphant/victorious/chi (Greek letter Χχ)
(noun suffix)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
(slang) (of women) to hunt for rich, attractive guys

sentences.english: It was important to get a good result before the Celtic tie.
sentences.chinese: 在對陣凱子的歐冠比賽前，獲得一場大勝是如此重要。

sentences.english: Boston punishes teams that don't make quick decisions with the ball.
sentences.chinese: 凱子狠狠的揍了一頓那些不能很快處理球的球隊。

sentences.english: The team that finally broke the Celtics' curse.
sentences.chinese: 那賽季的湖人終於打破凱子的魔咒。

sentences.english: A lot of folks must be overpaying.
sentences.chinese: 這麼說來，一定有一票人當了凱子。

sentences.english: The Celtics teams they battled were heavy in Hall of Famers, too.
sentences.chinese: 那時的凱子也有一大堆人都入選了名人堂。

sentences.english: It's not surprising the Celtics turned it around so dramatically, winning their last 10.
sentences.chinese: 凱子突然戲劇般的狀態大勇，已經10連勝了。

definition: to work as a good-time girl/to prostitute oneself
(coll.) pushover/soft touch
sneering/sarcasm/cynical remarks
to sow dissension (idiom); to drive a wedge between
to watch with amusement as sb makes a fool of himself
to flatter/to fawn on/to butter sb up/toadying/bootlicking
to ask for trouble/to invite difficulties
to use force
a bargain/cheap goods
to know the score (idiom)/to be well aware of the situation
brazen
to fawn on/to curry favor with/to make up to
to make an exhibition of oneself/to be a disgrace
ability/skill
to tell the truth/to tell it as it is
When you enter a country, follow the local customs (idiom); do as the natives do/When in Rome, do as the Romans do
